resources.string: لتتمكن من الحصول على نقاط الخطوات, تأكد انك اتتممت xxxx خطوة
xxx نقطة ستنتهي صلاحيتها بنهاية الشهر الحالي
Check whether the user has authorized the permissions. Request user authorization whenever needed.
The corresponding authorization needs to be granted on the device for the requested operation.
Check whether the device supports this platform.
Make sure that the activity to be started is correct.
The system version must be EMUI 8.1 or later.

"This exception will be thrown if the user has not authorized the Huawei Health app to open data to HUAWEI Health Kit. To authorize, the user needs to open Huawei Health, and go to Me > Settings > Data sharing > Health Kit > LINK. "
The user has to be a Huawei Health app user.
Make sure that the app authorizations are correct.
Please stay tuned for future updates.
Install the latest version of Huawei Health, grant authorizations, and try again
Install the latest version of Huawei Health and try again.
